DelegatedWork.description: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.longDescription: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of channels.

Application.description: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels.

Application.description: Read this team's channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of this team’s channels.

DelegatedWork.description: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.longDescription: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of channels.

Application.description: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels.

Application.description: Update this team's channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Update the names, descriptions, and settings of this team’s channels.
